author: signüll @signulll
text:
hold up lemme get this straight, the rise of openai saved google from being broken up & a dude from openai inspired sergey to go back to google & cut the crap.

& openai vague + hype train posting taught them how to market too. it’s like openai was post training google.

every google employee should give 2% of their equity to dan along with sama, oh & let’s not forget amit mehta. a really good writer wouldn’t be able to write this script. absolutely incredible lol.
